caption.p: Effects of catechin on the level of serum lipid parameters and Hb1c level in STZ-induced diabetic rats ( A) Serum level of TC, ( B) serum level of TG, ( C) serum level of LDL, ( D) serum level of HDL, ( E) serum level of Hb1c in STZ-induced diabetic rats. The values are expressed as mean ± SEM. Each value corresponds to a mean of eight animals ### p ˂ 0.001; comparison of a(normal control) vs. b(diabetic control) using Student’s t-test, * p ˂ 0.05, ** p ˂ 0.01, *** p < 0.001; comparison of b(diabetic control) vs. c(glibenclamide and CTN treated groups) using one way ANOVA followed by Dunnett’s post hoc multiple comparison test.
